# Problem 1
```{r data}
library(moderndive)
data("early_january_weather") # data set in moderndive library
summary(early_january_weather)

nrow(early_january_weather) # number of rows
ncol(early_january_weather) # number of columns

mean(early_january_weather$temp)
```

```{r scatter, cache=T}
library(ggplot2)
scatter_temp_hour <- early_january_weather %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=temp, y=time_hour, color=humid)) +
  geom_point(size=3)
```
